title: Lowest Level of Water Stress
description: In 2021, Congo had a water stress level of just 2.74%, indicating a minimal withdrawal of freshwater resources compared to availability.

title: Minimal Freshwater Withdrawals
description: Congo's annual freshwater withdrawals were only 2.07% of its internal resources in 2021, showcasing its sustainable water usage.

title: Limited Surgical Procedures
description: In 2018, Congo performed only 49 surgical procedures per 100,000 people, highlighting a significant gap in healthcare services.

title: Moderate Binding Coverage for Primary Products
description: As of 2015, Congo had a binding coverage of 52.18% for primary products, indicating a moderate level of trade protection.

title: Low New Displacement Due to Conflict
description: In 2019, Congo reported only 2 new cases of displacement associated with conflict and violence, reflecting relative stability.
